entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Doaktown
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:40 PM AST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -4.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Doaktown 02:00 AM AST Friday 03 March 2023
Temperature: -4.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.4 kPa rising
Humidity: 90 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -6.3°C
Wind: N 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy ending overnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Amount 15 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h early this evening then becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Clearing in the morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near noon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 02 March 2023
